mapper.select: select p.*, w.id w_id, w.descrim w_descrim, w.name w_name, w.sex w_sex, w.reg_dt w_reg_dt, w.upt_dt w_upt_dt from T_reply p LEFT OUTER JOIN T_party w ON p.writer_id = w.id where p.bb_id = #{boardId};

select r.*, w.id w_id, w.descrim w_descrim, w.name w_name, w.sex w_sex, w.reg_dt w_reg_dt, w.upt_dt w_upt_dt from T_reply r LEFT OUTER JOIN T_party w ON r.writer_id = w.id where r.id like CONCAT(#{id}, '%');
mapper.delete: delete from T_reply where id like CONCAT(#{id}, '%');
